Cells were then left unstimulated or were stimulated after 12 h with anti - <extra_id_0> CD2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , anti - <extra_id_0> CD3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , and anti - <extra_id_0> CD28 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .

Cells were harvested for mRNA detection of the target genes after 24 h and for protein detection after 48 h .
